component.name: Nimbus Sans
component.summary: An alternative font family for Helvetica typeface

description.p: This sans-serif font family is an alternative for the Helvetica typeface, and is part of Level 2 Core Font Set - PostScript specification of 35 base fonts that can be used with any PostScript file.
These 35 base fonts are provided freely by (URW++) company, and are mainly utilized by Ghostscript, or other applications using it.
